label: optpolsymb
description: Optimal treatment policy or dynamic treatment regime

label: polsetsymb
description: Set or space of all possible policies

label: maxobsindex
description: Maximal observation index. Equivalent to the sample size

label: timeindex
description: Time period index (Chapter~\ref{ch:ncworks}; distinct from calendar time)

label: maxindindex
description: Maximal individual index (Chapter~\ref{ch:ncworks}). Equal to the number of individuals in a cluster

label: symbperfcutoff
description: Chapter~\ref{ch:best}: percentage of optimal value cutoff

label: stdbasis
description: standard basis vector with a one at element $i$ and zero everywhere else

label: meanfun
description: Conditional expectation function that takes an observation and an arm as arguments

label: meanfunk
description: Conditional expectation function for arm $\armindex$ which takes an observation as an argument

label: funclass
description: Function class for the conditional expectation function

label: minimweight
description: vector of weights for the relative important of covariates (including the treatment arm) for calculating imbalance score in minimization

label: minimprob
description: Probability that minimization algorithm will assign the treatment that minimizes the imbalance score

label: paramvec
description: Vector of all mean model parameters (Chapter~\ref{ch:ncworks})

label: contrastmat
description: Contrast matrix that specifies Wald hypothesis tests (Chapter~\ref{ch:ncworks})

label: regpop
description: Population expected regret for a given (potentially estimated) policy

label: polhatkp
description: Estimated optimal policy not involving arm $\armindexprime$

label: op
description: Rate $r_n$ convergence to zero in probability
